text: Trond Marius Helgesen (born 28 December 1967) is a retired Norwegian football defender. He made his debut for Sogndal in 1989, and played there until joining Hødd in 1995. After the 1998 season he retired, doing a brief comeback in the latter half of 2000 for Sogndalsfjøra-based minnows Fjøra. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sogndal Category:Norwegian footballers Category:Sogndal Fotball players Category:IL Hødd players Category:Norwegian First Division players Category:Eliteserien players Category:Association football defenders
title: Trond Helgesen
